title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin takes a big look at the huge trade sending Tyreek Hill to the Dolphins and why the Chiefs made the right decision to move on from one of the best wide receivers in the league. He explains why acquiring Hill doesn’t automatically move the Dolphins into the contenders category for this one reason. He also has bad news for the Cowboys as their offseason continues to disappoint. Plus, former linebacker Channing Crowder joins the show to tell Colin why all the pressure is now on Tua Tagovailoa.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
